body_html: @ezyang This is for FunctionSchema, where sometimes I want a raw string, because it is referring to a function name and I want it reported to the user as they wrote it. Other times it is used as the schema for an operator and I need the Symbol for the operator to be fully qualified. More generally, I think having symbol act as a true interned string is useful because they are useful in various places.
